archimate:Requirement.name: REQ_BSS_0009
archimate:Requirement.documentation: As a marketer, I want to be able to present customers with package offerings when they are relevant to them, so that I can sell them more products with Vodafone

properties.value: Bundles of items can be sold together and presented in a dedicated tab OOTB. More details required. This is about free-bundling (bunling on the fly), which means the bundled prices should apply even if Customer has already a product and orders another one (so that both form a bundle). To be further discussed during the product catalogue session. [CCM] Supported, CCM can target customer based on his product data. Complex customer segments, based on data not present in CCM, can be created in external BI and imported to CCM
CCM, AP, DS, SC, PC, CNS

properties.key: Applies to Consumer only, Business only, or Both
